MSC - 2021

The third edition of the Model Solvay Conference held on 13th-14th March 2021 was a resounding success. The event brought together young physics enthusiasts from around the world to showcase their knowledge, engage in critical thinking, and collaborate with their peers.

The conference featured a guest talk by Professor Sreerup Raychaudhuri and a physics quiz was also held in collaboration with the IISER Bhopal Quiz Club (IBQC) while the highlight being the Model Solvay Conference itself.

MSC - 2021 (remote)

2021 was online but thanks to the MSC core team for organizing such a wonderful event regardless of the constraints.
